item.title: Những bài giảng, nói chuyện hay ho, thú vị
item.author: Author
item.description: Inside the mind of a master procrastinator | Tim Urban - YouTube Justice: What’s The Right Thing To Do? Do schools kill creativity? | Sir Ken Robinson - YouTube How frustration can make us more creative | Tim Harford - YouTube Young-ha Kim: Be an artist, right now! - YouTube Why some of us don’t have one true calling | Emilie Wapnick - YouTube Sheena Iyengar: The art of choosing - YouTube Keep your goals to yourself | Derek Sivers - YouTube The surprising thing I learned sailing solo around the world | Dame Ellen MacArthur - YouTube How to start a movement | Derek Sivers - YouTube Margaret Heffernan: Why it’s time to forget the pecking order at work - YouTube How to speak so that people want to listen | Julian Treasure - YouTube Dare to disagree | Margaret Heffernan - YouTube Why the best hire might not have the perfect resume | Regina Hartley - YouTube Why good leaders make you feel safe | Simon Sinek - YouTube Your body language may shape who you are | Amy Cuddy - YouTube Why are we happy?
